name: boxBox - GAME
description:
boxBox is almost a game! You are almost playing it! ... Don't make me beg. 

This project is a catalogue of my development as a developer, over the last few months. I've learnt a lot, mostly that online networking is a huge pain, and that I should never be allowed to code again for as long as I live. 

I'm prouda boxBox's basic rules though, hope you manage to have some fun with it - Hal :].
